project.title: Online Dynamic Web Designing Tool
project.technology: ASP.Net, C#, jQuery, Javascript, Bootstrap, MSSQL Server
project.description: This project was completed in B.Tech in a team of 5 members and the aim of this project was to provide a way to the non-technical person ability to develop website.

project.title: A website like Freelancer.com
project.technology: ASP.Net, C#, jQuery, Javascript, Bootstrap, MSSQL Server
project.description: This project is the same as Freelancer.com which includes two main functions like Hire and Work. We developed this as a simple application during the B.Tech Industrial Training program in team of 4 members.

project.title: Claim Ruler
project.technology: ASP.Net MVC 5, C#, jQuery, Javascript, Bootstrap, MSSQL Server, Database First Approach
project.description: This is a CRM project built on top of technologies like ASP.Net MVC, jQuery, Javascript etc and provides users facility to create Claims.

project.title: Street 2 Media
project.technology: ASP.Net MVC, C#, jQuery, Javascript, Bootstrap, SQL Server
project.description: Put your photos and videos in front of the media and get paid! Register today and download. All the uploaded photos will be reviewed by Collaborators and will be displayed privately so that public users can pay and download.

project.title: iHRM
project.technology: ASP.Net MVC, C#, jQuery, Angular.Js, Bootstrap, SQL Server
project.description: iHRM, an advanced leading software to manage Human Resource for a company. This project is built to provide the company a facility to create, update, delete users manage the user attendance etc.

project.title: Expense Management
project.description: This app is built using Ionic framework and using Node.Js service for authentication and back-end query and MongoDb is used for database storage.

project.title: Parse resume from Google Drive
project.technology: ASP.Net, C#, jQuery, Javascript, Bootstrap, MSSQL Server
project.description: This project uses Google Drive API to access the drive folder and reads the .doc and .docx files from the directory. It extracts the text from each file like Name, Degree, Technology, Skills etc and stores in SQL database. Admin can visit the page to view all the parsed resumes.

project.title: MowRichmond.com
project.technology: Node.Js, ExpressJs, Mongodb, jQuery, Javascript, Bootstrap, Stripe Payment Gateway
project.description: This website is running live in Richmond city of USA and using this site, users are able to search their address, register theirself for mow service and get the mow service weekly or monthly. It uses Stripe Payment Gateway for payment processing work and site is running at HTTPS protocol and uses SSL certificate.

project.title: Lets Chat
project.description: Lets chat is a mobile application built to provide the chat facility between users. Users need to register theirself before entering to the application and they can chat to another logged in persons in a ream time. I have used IonicJs framework to built the mobile layout for the application and using NodeJs as a Backend service for the application.

project.title: Church Prayer App
project.description: A church prayer wall where people can enter prayers regarding their loved ones to pray for. There is a button in the app say 'Pray', on clicking on the button, it will increase a counting number and hence users can click on button to pray for the posted prayer.

project.title: E-Commerce Online Shopping
project.technology: Node.Js, Angular.Js, ExpressJs, Mongodb, Bootstrap, CSS3
project.description: A place to buy things, its a greatest demandable website in the world. Everyone want to sell their products online and every people want to buy things online. I have made selling and buying functionality easy by developing this app. Users can buy, pay and get the desired product at home.
